meanings.definition: Having the power to determine or decide
meanings.sent1: The determinative factor in her decision was the cost.
meanings.sent2: His determinative choice shaped the outcome of the game.
meanings.sent3: The determinative role of luck in the game made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the determinative spark that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The determinative nature of his words left a lasting impact.

meanings.sent1: The determinative test results affected his treatment plan.
meanings.sent2: Her determinative actions guided the team to success.
meanings.sent3: The determinative weather forecast made them rethink their plans.
meanings.sent4: His determinative presence in the meeting set the tone for the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The determinative advice she gave changed his perspective.

meanings.definition: A factor or circumstance that determines or decides
meanings.sent1: Luck was the determinative in the final outcome.
meanings.sent2: The determinative of his success was his hard work.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected determinative of the party was the arrival of a clown.
meanings.sent4: The determinative of her mood was the sunny weather.
meanings.sent5: The crucial determinative in their decision was the deadline.
